General.Name: AnHui Annada Titanium Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Annada Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells titanium dioxide in China. The company offers leather and wood, plastic, rutile type, anatase type, green paint grade, and widely-used type titanium dioxide products under the Annada brand name. Its products are used in coatings, plastics, rubber, ink, paper, chemical fiber, daily chemical, medicine, and other industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Tongling, China.
General.Address: No. 1288 South Tongguan Road, Tongling, China

1.Name: Mr. Xian Long  Wang
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Sec. of the Board of Directors
